title: Poster, "Orpheus", 1958
provenance: Acquired from dealers, galleries and auction houses by Marc Benda.  Remained with Benda until 2010, when gifted to CHNDM.
creditline: Gift of Sara and Marc Benda
description: Background: black-and-white photograph of a man's face against foliage on left, mirrored onto right, joined at center, toned red. Inscription in white, starting at top: "ORPHEE / der Tod und die Liebe des Dichters / Ein Film von Jean Cocteau / Mit Jean Marais, Maria Casares, Marie Dea and Francois Perier/ Pradikat: besonders wertvoll/ Neue Filmkunst Walter Kirchner".
